title: The Adventure Zone: Dust Season 2 - Episode 4
description: The Graysons make their way through a speeding train to secure the payload and the future of Dry River. Augustus makes a change. Indrid gets a move on. Callan checks off his list. Lulu discovers something sinister.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (Travis McElroy, Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Clint McElroy, Erika Ishii)
